OctetStringPointObserver (FB)
OctetStringPointObserver (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL OctetStringPointObserver EXTENDS
PointObserver
IMPLEMENTS IOctetStringPointObserver
DNP3 Master datapoint observer for a datapoint of DNP3 object group 110 âoctet stringsâ.
Unlike other datapoint observer OctetStringPointObserver doesnt provide the received data as an output variable,
but writes to an buffer provided by the caller if the datapoint changes.
